item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 7:20, so let's meet at 6:50 inside the theater doors. Then I'll buy our tickets and we can get snacks and head in.

If you're going to be late, need directions or have to change your RSVP after 5:00 p.m. on Thursday, give me a call (508/308-4897).

Hope to see you Thursday for Goats!

--Dana

--------------------------------

OLD STUFF:
The Men Who Stare at Goats smacks Coen Brothers (and for a while I thought it was a Coen movie), but it's not. It's directed by Grant Heslov (Good Night and Good Luck). It stars George Clooney, Jeff Bridges and Ewan McGregor. And it promises to be weird in the best of ways!

SUMMARY:
Reporter Bob Wilton is in search of his next big story when he encounters Lyn Cassady, a shadowy figure who claims to be part of an experimental U.S. military unit. According to Cassady, the New Earth Army is changing the way wars are fought. A legion of "Warrior Monks" with unparalleled psychic powers can read the enemy's thoughts, pass through solid walls, and even kill a goat simply by staring at it. Now, the program's founder, Bill Django, has gone missing and Cassady's mission is to find him. Intrigued by his new acquaintance's far-fetched stories, Bob impulsively decides to tag along. When the pair tracks Django to a clandestine training camp run by renegade psychic Larry Hooper, the reporter is trapped in the middle of a grudge match between the forces of Django's New Earth Army and Hooper's personal militia of super soldiers. In order to survive this wild adventure, Bob will have to outwit an enemy he never thought possible.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet inside the theater doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Fridays (I'll bring the coupons!) to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update this meetup with a specific time a few days before, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for The Men Who Stare At Goats!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: The Men Who Stare At Goats
